message: does ij brouwerij do simple foodstuffs too?
Really good beer there, especially IJwitbier
I'm probably going to head to http://ot301.nl/ for some beer + ping pong
Ij brewery! :) http://maps.google.nl/maps/place?cid=8646369542578064324&q=ij+brouwerij&hl=nl&sll=52.469397,5.509644&sspn=5.401989,5.042725&ie=UTF8&ll=55.090944,2.988281&spn=0,0&z=7
I'll have a Zatte ('drunk one') I reckon. :)
Though the Natte ('wet one') is also quite soaky.
So depends on your definition of foodstuffs :-)
mm tosti
@niels_bom just get us to somewhere with bitterballen

@erikpub We also serve delicious snacks, including peanuts, boiled eggs, Trappist cheese, salami, smoked raw beef sausage (osseworst) from the renowned De Wit butchers, and meatballs in a gravy made with our Natte beer.
Dinner suggestion btw: http://www.alfonsosrestaurant.com/indexEN.htm
mmm I could use a tosti
Carrots ftw
@jespern nah man, bitterballen are overrated. We have a lot of food that is way better, we imported it from the rest of the world :-)
The OT is nice but it's not at walking distance from here. :P
Ij or whatever looks like walking distance though
@jespern never mind me I'm a vegetarian haha :-)
Up to 40 persons, but maybe half of us are from the Dja-conference and the other half are from the Ngo-conference...
@niels_bom fu, bitterballen ftw
Or if people like sushi (I do): http://goo.gl/Er15X Tempura near the zoo
@dokterbob - but you got a bike though? Won't be that far.
@akumria True. Also: OT301's got pretty good food. And it's cheap. :)
@dokterbob true that!
so, where are we going and when?
/me 's going for the brewery prolly. It's on the way home where I'll have Stuff (c) to do. :P
ij looks nice, too bad they close at 20:00..
OK, the unofficial plan is to head for "Brouwerij het IJ" a brewery + windmill: http://goo.gl/2gz1q it's about a 20 min walk and 5 min by bike.
Excellent!

Brouwerij het IJ closes at 8PM, but the cafe right next to it stays open longer and also serves meals (Langendijk). After that I suggest Kriterion, a movie theatre with a big foyer and friendly prices and atmosphere: http://goo.gl/WQoal
Yeah, are there still people around Brouwerij het IJ or Langendijk
Any idea on when you're moving to Kriterion? It's a bit closer to me, so don't want to trek out to Langendijk to discover you guys have left :)
We're still a bunch of people at Brouwerij!
